DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this proposal is to investigate brain response and connectivity changes evoked by video-guided acupuncture imagery treatment (VGAIT) and verum and sham acupuncture in healthy and patient populations to elucidate the underlying brain mechanisms of mind-body interaction, imagery, and acupuncture.
DOC.brief_title: Mechanistic Studies on Video-guided Acupuncture Imagery Treatment of Pain
DOC.criteria: Right handed healthy male and female adults aged 1860 No contraindications to fMRI scanning Current or past history of major medical, neurological, or psychiatric illness Any pain disorder Pregnancy Nonfluent speaker of English
